articles.title: ‘Everything that’s wrong with TV today’ - news.com.au
articles.description: The Emmys are the US’s premiere awards for the art of TV storytelling. It’s supposed to reflect the very best of (mostly) American TV in the 12 months to the end of May.
articles.content: Its probably the most common refrain youll hear about TV in 2022 and the problem is glaringly obvious in even the most elite circles.The Emmys are the US’s premiere awards for the art of TV storytell… [+10407 chars]

articles.title: Jill Biden forced to apologise over 'breakfast tacos' remark - 9News
articles.description: US First Lady Jill Biden has apologised after giving a speech which described Latino Americans as "as unique as breakfast tacos".
